sep.gaia.state

Class StateObservable

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • sep.gaia.state.StateObservable
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    State

    public abstract class StateObservable
extends java.util.Observable
    A class implemented by the abstract class State in order to be observed by any class that implements the StateObserver interface. A StateObservable informs each of its observers whenever its internal state is changed.
    Author:
    Max Witzelsperger, Johannes Bauer, Matthias Fisch

    • Constructor Detail

      • StateObservable

        public StateObservable()

    • Method Detail

      • register

        public void register(StateObserver obs)
        Method to make obs observe this. obs is added to an internal list of observers of this and will be notified whenever the state of this is changed.
        Parameters:
        obs - the observer to be added to the list of the observers of this

      • unregister

        public void unregister(StateObserver obs)
        Removes obs from the list of the observers of this.
        Parameters:
        obs - the observer of this to be removed

      • getObservers

        public java.util.Set<StateObserver> getObservers()
        Returns all observers registered.
        Returns:
        All observers registered.

      • notifyStateObservers

        public void notifyStateObservers()
        Method to make all registered observers of this update themselves. To be used whenever the state of this has changed.
